dtliExcerpt: Kevin Spacey brings his trademark cunning and silky malevolence to Shakespeare's scheming royal, but the production feels more like a star vehicle than a fully realized theatrical experience.
bwwExcerpt: "What sounds like a gimmick - a troupe of Shakespearean actors getting into costume and makeup in full view of the audience - turns out to be a stroke of genius when executed by the all-male company from Shakespeare's Globe in residence at Broadway's Belasco Theater....
showScoreExcerpt: Kevin Spacey brings his trademark cunning and silky malevolence to Shakespeare's scheming royal, but the production feels more like a star vehicle than a fully realized theatrical experience.
